sendTimeout: Send timeout in connection with server ⏱
receiveTimeout: Receive timeout in connection with server ⏰
badCertificate: The certificate provided by the server is not valid 📑
userNameLength: Username must be between 3 and 16 characters long.
userNameRules: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
namesRules: Names can only have alphabetic characters.
pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
phoneNumberRules:
Number must start with one of the valid prefixes:
010, 011, 012, or 015
followed by 8 digits.
passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
uppercaseRulePassword: At least one one uppercase letter.
lowercaseRulePassword: At least one one lowercase letter.
digitRulePassword: At least one digit must be there.
specialCharactersRulePassword: At least one special character(e.g., #?!@$%^&*-) must be included.
